ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

ID.description: A user defined value that represents the consumed (processed or defective) material. Typically this is an SKU number or a user material master number.

Name.description: A string description of the material.

Unit.title: EUInformation
Unit.description: OPC UA engineering unit information for the count.

Count.description: The amount of consumed (processed or defective) material on the current production job.

AccCount.description: The cumulative count value of the material produced (or consumed). This counter gives the user a non-resetting counter that may be used for OEE calculations

RemoteInterface.description: This structure is an array of remote interface information which include Number, ControlCmdNumber, CmdValue and Parameter.

Number.description: This is the unique number for the downstream/upstream unit machine using a common tag structure as the unit machine.

ControlCmdNumber.description: A user defined command number associated with coded value from a remote unit. This number is a coded value sent from one node on the network to another.

CmdValue.description: This is the command value associated with the ControlCmdNumber above.

Parameter.description: The parameter tags associated to commanded remote interface are typically used for command parameters that are given to the unit machine from remote machines.

ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

InterlockId.description: The NodeId of the interlock to set or reset.

State.description: The state that the targeted interlock should be set to.  True is set to interlocked, false is not interlocked.

Parameter.description: The array of parameter that can be used by the method

ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

Product.description: This structure is an array of product definition, which includes the ProductId, ProcessVariables array and Ingredient array.

ProductID.description: A unique number assigned to the product.

ProcessVariables.description: The array of Process variables associated with this product

ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

Ingredients.description: The array of ingredients associated with this product.

IngredientID.description: A unique number assigned to the ingredient.

Parameter.description: The array of Parameters that correspond to the ingredient

ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

RequestedMode.description: The requested mode from the list of available modes in the enumeration from ModeSelection

ID.description: A unique number assigned to the parameter

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

ProductID.description: A unique number assigned to the product.

ProcessVariables.description: The array of Process variables associated with this product

Value.description: This is the numeric value of the parameter

IngredientID.description: A unique number assigned to the ingredient.

Parameter.description: The array of Parameters that correspond to the ingredient
